channel.title: CVE Feed for Negocios -- Ragic Cloud DB
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Negocios -- Ragic Cloud DB

item.title: CVE-2021-38681|2024-08-04T01:51:19.202Z -- negocios -- ragic%20cloud%20db
item.description: A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been reported to affect QNAP NAS running Ragic Cloud DB. If exploited, this vulnerability allows remote attackers to inject malicious code. QNAP have already disabled and removed Ragic Cloud DB from the QNAP App Center, pending a security patch from Ragic.
